function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Crowdfunding and volunteer delivery services increasing physical interaction and potential exposure to the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and consideration for front-line workers in essential businesses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Frequent references to the visceral experience of being in the city under covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"People hoarding essential supplies such as toilet paper","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to gather in public spaces leading to new ways of social interaction","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of representation of embodied sounds and communication in scholarly journals","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Marginalized people being more physically visible and exposed in cities during the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on media for information about the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inequitable access to technology and education impacting ability to understand and share experiences during the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 disproportionately affecting vulnerable populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Structural issues exacerbating health and safety risks in the built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overpopulated slums at high risk due to virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic breakdown in iran due to sanctions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases in crowded cities due to interactions in social and professional settings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of coyotes in downtown-adjacent neighborhood","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in urban soundscape due to covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transformation of urban soundscape as a reduction in the sounds of capitalism","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Anti-density discourse may reinforce overcrowding in homes due to insane rents.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in urban soundscape due to social distancing and lockdown measures.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Change in city soundscape due to covid-19 containment measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of people in the city due to containment measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Structural and political questions arising from the quietness of the city","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of public transportation and crowded areas in cities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stereotypical representations of city sounds and environments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of attention to complexities, ironies, and potentialities of modernity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rigid polarities and flat totalisations in twentieth-century thinking","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Loss of geographical sensibility in spatial storytelling","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of dialogue between individual contributors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Neglect of communication and dialogue in organizing cities and lives","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate use of podcasting and radio as research dissemination methods","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity and interaction with various individuals during the podcast project.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Personal and immediate contributions may lead to a lack of academic rigor in addressing contagious disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Anxiety and self-reflection can affect the ability to objectively analyze and address contagious disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focusing on faraway lands may result in neglecting local contagious disease propagation issues","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate control over the quality of audio submissions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness or consideration for contagious disease transmission during audio recording","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration for privacy and consent during recording","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interpreting vague instructions leading to different interpretations of the task","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of the task leading to off-topic submissions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of covid-19 being used as a context for contributions without explicit request","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Discussion of covid-19 pandemic and academic experts’ role","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Call for audio stories about covid-19 experiences","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global call for academic reports on covid-19 implications","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of audio material from multiple locations around the world may introduce contagious diseases from different regions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gentrifying landscapes and heavily populated urban areas may have higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene practices in urban areas may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased speed of communication mediums leading to rapid spread of misinformation about diseases.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaboration in new ways leading to the spread of unverified research findings or unreliable data.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intersection of sonic and textual outputs leading to the misinterpretation of research findings or communication of inaccurate information.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of covid-19 on global north and south","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
